message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer and understand the value of the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is still a bit high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $16,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $16,750.  This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $16,500 for the product.
